'''''Mallorn'' 56''' is the fifty-sixth issue of the [[The Tolkien Society]]'s annual journal ''[[Mallorn (journal)|Mallorn]]'', published in Winter [[2015]].

* '''Cover Art'''
** "The Prancing Pony"
*** By: Tomás Hijo

*** By: [[Helen Armstrong]]

*** By: Jay Ruud
** "[[Middle-earth]] and Midgard: the Viking Sagas in Tolkien’s [[Legendarium]]"
*** By: Logan Quigley
** "Tolkien's Tom Bombadil and Social Media: An Excursus Note"
*** By: Thad A. Burkhart
** "[[J.R.R. Tolkien]]'s '[[Leaf by Niggle|''Leaf by Niggle'']]': A Fantastic Journey to Afterlife"
*** By: Ahmet Mesut Ateş
** "'Beautiful and Terrible': The Significance of [[Galadriel]]'s Hair in ''[[The Lord of the Rings]]'' and ''[[Unfinished Tales]]''"
*** By: Lilian Darvell
** "Tolkien's First Notebook and its Destruction"
*** By: Nancy Bunting
** "Parallel Paths and Distorting Mirrors: Strategic Duality as a Narrative Principle in Tolkien's Works"
